methods.name: canSeeFriendlyInvisibles
javadoc: Checks whether members of this team can see other members that are invisible.

methods.name: getCollisionRule
javadoc: Gets the rule to be used for handling collisions with members of this team.

methods.name: getColor
javadoc: Gets the color for this team. The team color is used mainly for team kill objectives and team-specific setDisplay usage" it does _not_ affect all situations (for instance, the prefix is used for the glowing effect).

methods.name: getDeathMessageVisibility
javadoc: Gets the visibility flags for player death messages.

methods.name: getDisplayName
javadoc: Gets the display name for this team.

methods.name: getName
javadoc: Retrieve the name by which this team is registered in the scoreboard

methods.name: getNameTagVisibility
javadoc: Gets the visibility flags for player name tags.

methods.name: getPlayers
javadoc: Gets a collection of all members of this team.

methods.name: isAllowFriendlyFire
javadoc: Checks whether friendly fire (PVP between members of the team) is allowed.

methods.name: packOptions
javadoc: Gets a bitmask containing the friendly fire and invisibles flags.

methods.name: setAllowFriendlyFire
javadoc: Sets whether friendly fire (PVP between members of the team) is allowed.

methods.name: setCollisionRule
javadoc: Sets the rule to be used for handling collisions with members of this team.

methods.name: setColor
javadoc: Sets the color for this team. The team color is used mainly for team kill objectives and team-specific setDisplay usage" it does _not_ affect all situations (for instance, the prefix is used for the glowing effect).

methods.name: setDeathMessageVisibility
javadoc: Sets the visibility flags for player death messages.

methods.name: setDisplayName
javadoc: Sets the display name for this team.

methods.name: setNameTagVisibility
javadoc: Sets the visibility flags for player name tags.

methods.name: setSeeFriendlyInvisibles
javadoc: Sets whether members of this team can see other members that are invisible.

methods.name: unpackOptions
javadoc: Sets friendly fire and invisibles flags based off of the given bitmask.
